name: Freak Hunter A Retro Type
description:
Freak Hunter A Retro Type is a very fun platform game. Kill all creatures and complete the level. The more creatures you kill, the more points you get. But check the ammo of your gun because when it runs out you will have to use a knife.

If you want, you can play single player combat or double co-op with your friend. Apart from that, you can fight with your friend in the arenas section. You can try to shoot each other.

You can use the physics mechanics of the game in your favor, for example, you can hit the weight hanging from the chain and make it fall to the ground, if there is any enemy under it, it will be crushed and die.

There is a section design menu in the game, so you can design your own sections.

You can also have the automatic section design done by artificial intelligence in this game. An infinite number of different levels are waiting for you, you can also edit these level designs if you wish.

Game Features:
- Single player combat mode
- Co-op combat mode
- PvP encounter mode
- Episode design mode
- Steam achievements
- Augmented physics calculation engine
- Ability to push, pull, break interactive boxes
- Fluent animations that look cute
